thread.title: Shop closures slows as economy turns the corner - Deloitte
thread.title_full: Shop closures slows as economy turns the corner - Deloitte

title: Shop closures slows as economy turns the corner - Deloitte
text:
07 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Retail administrations have slowed dramatically in the first half of 2015 as the economy stabilises, according to research from Deloitte. Available to members only
